description:
Hyosub Kim is a speaker for the PyMCon Web Series. In this talk Hyosub talks about some new tools he's developed to help make running Bayesian versions of some of the most common statistical tests used in the behavioral and neural sciences intuitive and transparent.

View all the details about his talk on Bayesian Statistical Testing on the PyMC Discourse
https://discourse.pymc.io/t/pymcon-web-series-05-the-bayesian-statistics-toolbox-april-17th-2023-hyosub-kim/11845

PyMCon is a community conference where we share the latest and greatest in statistical practices, tricks, and tips. The PyMCon Web Series CFP is currently open! Submit your proposals here https://pymcon.com/cfp/

Sign up for the PyMCon mailing list: 
https://dashboard.mailerlite.com/forms/241188/73241617305175542/share

Join us on 
Discourse: https://discourse.pymc.io/
Meetup: https://www.meetup.com/pymc-online-meetup/
title: Bayesian Statistics Toolbox
